To that end, he's asked me to find a way to render the luminous adra there unusable. He didn't provide specific instructions, but the details may become clearer when I see the site for myself. ## Walkthrough * The quest is straightforward and requires you to complete [The Storms of Poko Kohara](/theStormsOfPokoKohara/), preferably by sabotaging the great pillar. Return once the deed is done. ** If you destroyed the pillar, the talk is straightforward. You will receive two lots of Moderate Positive reputation with the RDC, and {{cp2|1250}} for your efforts. ** Otherwise, you receive a Moderate Negative reputation with RDC. But at the same time, you can also gain Minor Positive reputation by making an excuse: *** ''"Now that I have their trust. Imagine what I can do with that."' [[Shady](/shady/)] *** [Bluff](/bluff/) 4 - [Lie] ''"My powers don't work that way. There was nothing I could do."' :: Then he says that the storms around the island have cleared, and asks what you know of it. You get Moderate Positive reputation with the RDC regardless of your answer. * Talk to [Hazanui Karū](/hazanuiKaru/) to begin the next quest. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/XX_RDC_Faction_Questline/FCT_QST_RDC01_Poko_Kohara.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Dim Prospects''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Atsura has asked me to thwart the Vailian Trading Company's plans for Poko Kohara. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Disrupt the luminous adra at Poko Kohara.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Atsura, grand secretary of the Royal Deadfire Company, wants me to impede the Vailians' progress at Poko Kohara. To that end, he's asked me to find a way to render the luminous adra there unusable. He didn't provide specific instructions, but the details may become clearer when I see the site for myself. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Atsura at Imperial Command in the Brass Citadel.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Atsura will want to know what happened at Poko Kohara. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | Atsura was pleased to hear that I'd destroyed the luminous adra pillar at Poko Kohara. He was intrigued at the effect on the local storms, as well. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30001 | Atsura was disappointed to hear that I'd restored the luminous adra at Poko Kohara. However, he was intrigued at the effect on the local storms. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{cross}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30002 | The Royal Deadfire Company wants nothing more to do with me, so I won't be reporting back to them anytime soon. |}
